article.title: Korka Assigned to Naval Facilities Engineering Command Pacific
article.abstract: Capt. John W. Korka, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and assigned as commander, Naval Facilities Engineering Command Pacific, Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.
article.text: Capt. John W. Korka, USN, has been selected for promotion to rear admiral and assigned as commander, Naval Facilities Engineering Command Pacific, Pearl Harbor, Hawaii.
